title: Band, 1801–50
medium:
Medium: linen, hair
Technique: needle lace with ground of loop & twist with twist return
provenance: ex-collection: Countess Valencia de Don Juan
dimensions: H x W: 14.5 x 149 cm (5 11/16 x 58 11/16 in.); repeat: 3.5 inches
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Scalloped border showing continuous branch of cone-shaped blossoms. Fond: réseau ordinaire. Modes: enchainettes, Point Mignon, Semé de Larmes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Band, 1801–50.
1801–50. Medium: linen, hair
Technique: needle lace with ground of loop & twist with twist return. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-41.
